name: Suits
description: Suits is a USA Network drama which premiered on June 23, 2011. The series stars Gabriel Macht, and Patrick J. Adams.

name: Shooter
description: A conspiracy thriller that follows the journey of Bob Lee, a decorated veteran who is coaxed back into action to prevent a plot to kill the President.

name: Supernatural
description: Supernatural is an American dark fantasy horror television series created by Eric Kripke. It was first broadcast on September 13, 2005
